node.title: On April Fools' Day, I'll...
node.choices: be dressed in [http://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/fool|motley] be playing [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Fool_on_the_Hill|The Fool] still be [http://media.photobucket.com/image/fool%20tarot/NakeyVegan/fool-tarot-card.gif?o=10|The Fool] be watching / listening to / singing [wp://Pagliacci] or [wp://Rigoletto] be trying to fool you be perpetrating a Perl-ish prank (nominations invited) be executing a non-programming prank be wondering whether it's [http://www.ehow.com/how_7827013_recognize-iron-pyrites-gold-pan.html|Iron Pyrites] be practicing to avoid [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vFKxKviVL1I|Fool's Mate] be still together with my [http://www.fool.com/|money] (little though it is) be trying to [http://lunalightdesign.com/html/jester.htm|amuse you] be wondering why yyyy/4/1 is [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/April_Fools%27_Day|associated with foolishness] Still be writing scripts without "use strict;" and "use warnings;"
